text:
AdQuick | Senior Software Engineer | REMOTE | Venice, CA

We're building the AdWords for outdoor advertising. We're used by companies like Instacart, Squarespace and Eaze.

Our engineering team is remote with a home base in Venice (everyone flies in every so often). Rails/React/Postgres/Redis/Mapbox stack.

Email me if you'd like to learn more: fahim@adquick.com
